16  package com.stormpath.shiro.cache;
17  
18  import com.stormpath.sdk.cache.Cache;
19  import com.stormpath.sdk.cache.CacheManager;
20  import com.stormpath.sdk.lang.Assert;
21  
22  /**
23   * A Stormpath SDK {@link CacheManager} implementation that wraps a Shiro
24   * {@link org.apache.shiro.cache.CacheManager CacheManager} instance.  This allows the Stormpath SDK to use your
25   * existing Shiro caching mechanism so you only need to configure one caching implementation.
26   * <p/>
27   * This implementation effectively acts as an adapter or bridge from the Stormpath SDK cacheManager API to the Shiro
28   * cacheManager API.
29   *
30   * @since 0.4.0
31   */
32  public class ShiroCacheManager implements CacheManager {
33  
34      private final org.apache.shiro.cache.CacheManager SHIRO_CACHE_MANAGER;
35  
36      /**
37       * Constructs a new {@code ShiroCacheManager} instance that wraps (delegates to) the specified
38       * Shiro {@link org.apache.shiro.cache.CacheManager CacheManager} instance.
39       *
40       * @param shiroCacheManager the target Shiro cache manager to wrap.
41       */
42      public ShiroCacheManager(org.apache.shiro.cache.CacheManager shiroCacheManager) {
43          Assert.notNull(shiroCacheManager, "Shiro CacheManager instance cannot be null.");
44          this.SHIRO_CACHE_MANAGER = shiroCacheManager;
45      }
46  
47      /**
48       * Consults the wrapped Shiro {@link org.apache.shiro.cache.CacheManager CacheManager} instance to obtain a
49       * named Shiro {@link org.apache.shiro.cache.Cache Cache} instance.  The instance is wrapped and returned as a
50       * {@link ShiroCache} instance, which acts as a bridge/adapter over Shiro's existing Cache API.
51       *
52       * @param name the name of the cache to acquire.
53       * @param <K>  The cache key type
54       * @param <V>  The cache value type
55       * @return the Cache with the given name
56       */
57      @Override
58      public <K, V> Cache<K, V> getCache(String name) {
59          final org.apache.shiro.cache.Cache<K, V> shiroCache = SHIRO_CACHE_MANAGER.getCache(name);
60          return new ShiroCache<K, V>(shiroCache);
61      }
62  }
